column5: Just having a moment goin back to my London roots...found these old beer ads from the 80's  <iframe width="420" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/Pmno3TQtiwM" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
Mom was a Londoner.Up your trousers was one of her favourite sayings.  Thanks for the memory.   Paul
It takes an Englishman to smoke Turkish
Nah Bruce....the wacky leaves me Barnet in a right two and eight...nahwotimeen mate.
